{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3306243,"name":"","username":"Boss777","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/a698b9/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-02-10T06:20:29.379Z","cooked":"

Hi all,
I’m looking to switch our MK4i modules from L3 to L1 and could use some help figuring out the necessary parts.
Has anyone here done this before and can share a parts list or any tips?
Thanks in advance!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2024-02-10T06:20:29.379Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":10,"reads":192,"readers_count":191,"score":88.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":454146,"topic_slug":"switchinng-mk4i-from-l3-to-l1","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64140,"hidden":false,"trust_level":0,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/switchinng-mk4i-from-l3-to-l1/454146/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3306248,"name":"Mihir Garg","username":"mihirgarg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mihirgarg/{size}/215010_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-10T06:39:06.192Z","cooked":"

You only need to switch two gears (I’ve highlighted them below).
You’ll need this 19t gear and this 25t-50t double gear

As for changing them out, it’s not difficult at all. Just make sure to clean the bolts you remove and re-apply locktite. We had that 19t gear literally fall out during semi-finals last year…
